lessons.title: The Evolution of Sexual Wellness: From Pathology to Empowerment
outline: Historical Context: Analyzing the shift from the clinical 'Medical Model' of sexual dysfunction to the modern 'Holistic Wellness Model.'

Managing Transference: Identifying and navigating the unique psychological dynamics that emerge in sexual wellness work.
